text: Sia Partners is a global consultancy
with a strong focus on AI.
At the beginning of the year,

we decided to accelerate
the pace of AI innovation,
and we launched SiaGPT.

We use the full spectrum of
services of coming out from AWS,

from Bedrock, from all databases,
services, all the stack.

We have established most of
what we do in AI with AWS.
It's very helpful

because these services
are very innovative,
very easy to use,

and we can focus on what
is the added value for us,
which is the business topics.

Every time the clients
are ringing the bell,
we need anything for yesterday.

So, using AWS is helping
us to be very fast

and to be very efficient and
to deliver a proof of concept

in just a timeframe of
two weeks, for instance.
It creates an environment
which is very safe for our clients.
A lot of data protection, data privacy,
which is the top priority for all of us.
So, that's the first priority for us.
And then the scalability of the solutions,
it's super important too.

The ecosystem that AWS
has built is very open.

It means that we have
many options on the table
and we can develop the most personalized

and customized solutions
for all our clients.
